title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Driving business outcomes with complete AWS Marketplace solutions (PEX111)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过完整的 AWS Marketplace 解决方案推动业务成果 (PEX111)
abstract: Organizations are increasingly seeking complete, ready-to-deploy solutions rather than individual products. Learn how AWS Marketplace empowers Partners to deliver comprehensive business solutions that include multiple software products and professional services. This powerful capability enables buyers to procure complete, outcome-focused solutions through a streamlined experience. Whether you're an ISV adding professional services to your software, a systems integrator building solutions, or a buyer looking to simplify procurement, discover how the solution-centric approach in AWS Marketplace helps accelerate digital transformation while reducing procurement complexity.
abstract_cn: 组织越来越寻求完整的、即用型解决方案，而不是单个产品。了解AWS Marketplace如何赋能合作伙伴交付包含多个软件产品和专业服务的综合业务解决方案。这一强大功能使买家能够通过简化的体验采购完整的、以结果为导向的解决方案。无论您是为软件添加专业服务的ISV、构建解决方案的系统集成商，还是希望简化采购的买家，都可以了解AWS Marketplace中以解决方案为中心的方法如何帮助加速数字化转型，同时降低采购复杂性。
